name: King's Darkness
description:
In the world of King's Darkness your Reflex, Accuracy and Patience will be tested to see if you are worthy of being a king.

King's Darkness is an offline fantasy platformer which you should pass every level by avoiding and fighting enemy and obstacles, you should also collect lights to pass the gate in every level. 

Warning: This game will definitely challenge you and your patience, Goodluck. 

Version: v1.2

- Fixed some bug

- Fixed Ads errors

- Added light points label
